ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:18:43 [Issue ID 4000-486708] urn:comicvine:4000-486708 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 23:41:46. [Issue ID 1342151]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Parody clips from the movie American Sniper with commentary by celebrities.
A kid's show host tries to cope with an audience of cynical children while advertising expensive toys, violent toys, and cookies.
Condemned man Pedro asks for lethal injection instead of a firing squad, but doesn't quite get what he expected.
Questions meant to embarrass a sex education teacher.
The problems of living in California, mostly the Los Angeles area.
The family gives Mr. McGee his last wish after death, without proper planning.
Al provides the typical snappy answers to morons' questions.
The White Spy creates a staff that parts waters to get through the moat on the Black Spy's fortress, but the piranha that remain behind the water prove a problem.
The Black Spy falls for the "old digging a hole through a cliff overhang" bit.
Al discusses how honored he is to be the first ever guest editor of Mad, until he discovers that no one else would accept the job when offered.

ComicInfo.Title: American Sniping; The Strip Club; Mad Looks at a Typical Kiddie TV Show; The Captivating Tale of Pedro's Execution; Things to Ask Your Sex Ed Teacher (Just to Mess with Him); A Mad Look at California; The Baleful Yarn of the Mourning McGees; Snappy Answers to Stupid Questions Special "Weird Al" Edition; Spy Vs Spy
